title: Mukesh Ambani, the richest man in India, donated $66 million to coronavirus aid after being slammed for ringing a bell from the balcony of his 27-story mansion to thank healthcare workers
description: Mukesh Ambani, India's richest man, pledged ₹500 crore ($66.7 million) to Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's coronavirus emergency fund, Ambani's nonprofit Reliance Foundation announced on Twitter. Ambani was criticized on social media after his wife share…
content:
India's richest man pledged to help fund humanitarian aid amid his country's growing coronavirus crisis, after a video of him taking part in a nationwide moment of celebration in honor of medical workers Sunday provoked criticism.
